titleStmt.title: Francisci Mildapetti Nauerreni ad Euerardum Digbeium Anglum admonitio de unica P. Rami methodo reiectis Caeteris retinenda
titleStmt.author: Temple, William, Sir, 1555-1627.

publicationStmt.publisher: Excudebat Henricus Middletonus, impensis Thomæ Man,

notesStmt.note: Francisci Mildapetti Naverreni is a pseudonym for Sir William Temple.
Answers: Sir Everard Digby. De duplici methodo libri duo. (STC 6841).
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
